com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource

Class DataSourceRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource.DataSourceProvider
      • com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource.DataSourceRepository

  • public final class DataSourceRepository
extends DataSourceProvider
    Central repository of all known DataSources. Whenever is a new DataSource added to DataSources tree, DataSourceRepository detects it and emits notifications to listeners.
    Author:
    Jiri Sedlacek
